name: Full Stack Developer
title: Full Stack Developer / Tech Lead
summary: Full Stack Developer with 13+ years of experience delivering secure, scalable, and high-performance applications across Live Streaming, AI, and enterprise platforms.
Experienced in integrating AI/ML services, real-time data pipelines, and intelligent user experiences.
Skilled in cloud-native architecture, RESTful API design, team leadership, and full-stack delivery using modern JavaScript, Python, and PHP technologies.
Proficient in PHP, Node.js, Vue.js, Python, Angular.js
Skilled in cloud-native architecture, RESTful API design, and performance optimization
Experienced in team mentoring, Agile delivery, and cross-functional collaboration

skills.label: Languages & Frameworks
skills.value: Node.js (Nest, Express), PHP (Laravel, Yii), Python (FastAPI), Vue.js, Angular

skills.label: Databases
skills.value: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, Redis, MySQL, SQL Server, Elasticsearch

skills.label: AI Integrations
skills.value: OpenAI, Google Vision API, AWS Rekognition, TensorFlow, HuggingFace

skills.label: Third-Party Integrations
skills.value: Wowza, Jitsi, Hive, Stripe, PayPal, Google API, Auth0, Minio, RabbitMQ, Kafka

skills.label: Cloud & DevOps
skills.value: AWS, Google Cloud, Docker, Kubernetes, CI/CD, Git, GitHub Actions

skills.label: Practices
skills.value: API Design, Microservices Architecture, Code Review, Performance Optimization

experience.title: Development Team Lead
details: Led full-stack development using PHP, Node.js, Vue.js, and PostgreSQL
Improved backend performance by 40%, supporting high-concurrency workloads
Optimized backend APIs, reducing response time by 40%
Implemented CI/CD pipelines, cutting deployment time by 70%
Mentored 8+ developers, elevating code quality and Agile practices

experience.title: Senior Software Developer
details: Developed enterprise applications using .NET and SQL Server
Created technical documentation and supported cross-team collaboration
Managed client communication, project planning, and timely delivery

experience.title: Software Developer
details: Designed and delivered custom .NET-based solutions for business-critical needs

achievements: Boosted team productivity by 20% through Agile processes and mentoring
Reduced technical debt by 35% with structured refactoring and code reviews
Delivered client-facing platforms contributing to 25% increase in revenue
